comment.author: 97779508@N00
comment._content: The surname is spelled correctly on the photograph and incorrectly on the header. This man is Alfred Buser, captain of the undefeated 1912 University of Wisconsin football team. You can read more about him in my blog post about this photograph.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information. We'll look into it.

comment.author: 97779508@N00
comment._content: The link in the LOC notes (above) is missing a character, so it doesn't work. Here's the complete link if you want to read more about Buser: nadinegoff.blogspot.com/2008/03/something-else-to-do-lear...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Central Historian:  Sorry about the typo in the link within our notes.  Now fixed.

comment.author: 56091178@N00
comment._content: The image says 11-5-11 which looks like the date of the image. November 1911 makes sense - it was his final season as a player when he was the team captain. He became a Wisconsin director of athletics after graduating in 1912. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfred_L._Buser

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: royal_broil:  Thanks for catching the date on the photograph.  We will update the image description to include it.
